name: The Forest Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
description: Banff National Park is a beautiful and iconic destination located in the Rocky Mountains of Alberta, Canada. A tour through this national park is an opportunity to explore breathtaking landscapes, including glistening lakes, towering peaks, and dense forests. During the tour, you may have the chance to spot a variety of wildlife, such as elk, bighorn sheep, and grizzly bears. You can also take part in a variety of outdoor activities, such as hiking, rock climbing, and whitewater rafting!

name: The Sea Explorer
summary: Exploring the jaw-dropping US east coast by foot and by boat
description: A tour of the East Coast of the United States by foot and boat is a unique and exciting way to explore this diverse and historic region. The East Coast is home to a variety of iconic cities and landmarks, including New York City, Washington D.C., and Boston. During the tour, you'll have the opportunity to walk through the bustling streets of these cities and discover their rich histories and cultures. You'll also have the chance to visit iconic landmarks and attractions, such as the Statue of Liberty, the White House, and Fenway Park. In addition to exploring the cities by foot, you'll also have the opportunity to take in the beauty of the East Coast by boat. You may have the chance to sail along the Atlantic coast and visit charming coastal towns, or even take a ferry to one of the nearby islands. Overall, a tour of the East Coast by foot and boat is a fantastic way to experience all that this region has to offer. From the vibrant cities to the stunning natural beauty, there's something for everyone on this tour!

name: The Snow Adventurer
summary: Exciting adventure in the snow with snowboarding and skiing
description: A snowboarding and skiing tour is the perfect opportunity to experience the thrill of sliding down the slopes on a board or skis. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, this tour has something to offer for everyone. During the tour, you'll have the opportunity to visit some of the best ski resorts and mountains in the region, and you'll be able to choose from a variety of slopes to suit your skill level. You'll be provided with top-quality equipment and instruction from experienced guides, so you can enjoy your time on the slopes to the fullest. In addition to skiing and snowboarding, you may also have the opportunity to participate in other winter activities, such as ice skating, dog sledding, and snowshoeing. You'll also have the chance to relax and unwind in the cozy lodges and hotels that are located at the resorts. Overall, a snowboarding and skiing tour is a fantastic way to experience the thrill of sliding down the slopes and enjoy the beauty of the winter landscape. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, this tour is sure to be an exciting and memorable experience!

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Living the life of Wanderlust in the US' most beatiful cities
description: A tour through the United States' most beautiful cities is a chance to explore some of the country's most iconic and picturesque destinations. You'll have the opportunity to visit a variety of cities, each with its own unique charm and character. Some of the cities you may visit on the tour include San Francisco, with its iconic Golden Gate Bridge and hilly streets, and Charleston, with its historic mansions and cobblestone streets. You may also visit Santa Fe, with its colorful adobe buildings and rich cultural heritage, and Seattle, with its stunning mountain and water views. During the tour, you'll have the chance to take in the beauty of these cities, visit iconic landmarks and attractions, and learn about their histories and cultures. You may also have the opportunity to participate in activities such as sightseeing tours, museum visits, and culinary experiences. Overall, a tour through the United States' most beautiful cities is a fantastic way to experience the diversity and beauty of this country. Whether you're a history buff, a culture vulture, or simply looking to take in the stunning natural and man-made beauty of the United States, this tour has something to offer!

name: The Park Camper
summary: Breathing in Nature in America's most spectacular National Parks
description: A tour of America's National Parks is a journey through some of the most breathtaking and iconic landscapes in the United States. From the majestic peaks of the Rocky Mountains to the vast deserts of the Southwest, the National Parks of America are home to a wide range of natural wonders. During the tour, you'll have the opportunity to explore these awe-inspiring landscapes, take part in outdoor activities like hiking and camping, and learn about the unique histories and cultures of each park. You'll also have the chance to spot a variety of wildlife, including bison, elk, and bears.Some of the National Parks you may visit on the tour include Yellowstone, Yosemite, and the Grand Canyon. No matter which parks you visit, you'll be sure to leave with unforgettable memories and a greater appreciation for the beauty and importance of America's natural spaces!

name: The Sports Lover
summary: Surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing and more, all in one tour
description: A sports lover tour that includes surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing, and other sports is the ultimate adventure for anyone who loves to stay active and try new things. This tour is perfect for thrill-seekers who are looking for a diverse range of sports and activities to enjoy. During the tour, you'll have the opportunity to experience a variety of sports, from surfing and skating to parajumping and rock climbing. You'll have the chance to visit some of the best locations for these activities, and you'll be guided by experienced instructors who will ensure your safety and provide expert instruction. In addition to participating in sports, you'll also have the chance to learn about the history and culture of each activity. You'll have the opportunity to meet local athletes and learn about the unique challenges and rewards of each sport. Overall, a sports lover tour that includes surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing, and other sports is an unforgettable adventure that offers something for everyone. Whether you're an experienced athlete or simply looking to try new things, this tour is sure to be a thrilling and rewarding experience!

name: The Wine Taster
summary: Exquisite wines, scenic views, exclusive barrel tastings,  and much more
description: A wine tasting tour is a perfect opportunity to explore the world of wine and discover new and interesting flavors. Depending on the region you visit, you may have the chance to taste a wide range of wines, from bold reds to crisp whites and everything in between. During the tour, you'll visit a number of wineries and have the opportunity to sample a selection of wines at each one. You'll also have the chance to learn about the wine-making process, from grape-growing and harvesting to fermentation and aging. In addition to tasting the wines, you'll also have the chance to learn about the histories and cultures of the wineries you visit. You may even get to meet the winemakers and hear their stories firsthand. Overall, a wine tasting tour is a delightful experience that combines the pleasure of tasting new wines with the opportunity to learn about the art and science of winemaking. Whether you're a seasoned wine connoisseur or simply looking to try something new, a wine tasting tour is sure to be an enjoyable and memorable experience!

name: The Star Gazer
summary: The most remote and stunningly beautiful places for seeing the night sky
description: A star-gazing tour is a perfect opportunity to marvel at the beauty of the night sky and learn about the constellations, planets, and other celestial objects that inhabit it. During the tour, you'll visit a location with minimal light pollution, such as a remote observatory or a dark sky park, to get the best view of the stars. You'll have the chance to view the stars through telescopes or binoculars, and an experienced guide will help you locate and identify various celestial objects. You may have the chance to see planets, galaxies, nebulae, and more, depending on the time of year and the location of the tour. In addition to viewing the stars, you'll also have the opportunity to learn about the history and science of astronomy. Your guide will be able to provide information about the mythology and cultural significance of the constellations, as well as the latest research and discoveries in the field. Overall, a star-gazing tour is a magical experience that offers a chance to connect with the universe and learn about the mysteries of the cosmos. Whether you're a seasoned stargazer or simply looking to experience the wonder of the night sky, a star-gazing tour is sure to be an unforgettable experience!

name: The Northern Lights
summary: Enjoy the Northern Lights in one of the best places in the world
description: A tour of the Northern Lights, also known as the Aurora Borealis, is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness one of the most spectacular natural phenomena on Earth. The Northern Lights are a mesmerizing display of dancing lights that occur in the high-latitude regions of the Earth, and they are caused by the interaction of solar particles with the Earth's magnetic field. During the tour, you'll have the opportunity to witness the Northern Lights in all their glory, often from a prime viewing location, such as a remote cabin or a heated viewing platform. You may also have the chance to take part in activities such as snowshoeing, dog sledding, or skiing, depending on the location of the tour. In addition to viewing the Northern Lights, you'll also have the chance to learn about the science behind this amazing natural phenomenon. Your guide will be able to provide information about the causes of the Northern Lights and the conditions that need to be present for them to occur. Overall, a tour of the Northern Lights is a once-in-a-lifetime experience that offers a chance to witness the beauty and power of nature. Whether you're an avid stargazer or simply looking to see one of the world's most incredible natural wonders, a tour of the Northern Lights is sure to be an unforgettable experience!
